entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 31 December 2022
